snippet.title: Victorian Mysteries: The Yellow Room
snippet.description:
~Love Games? Subscribe and click the Bell to get notified of new game releases every day!

In 19th Century France, a young woman is attacked in the middle of the night inside a locked room. There are only two ways out: a dead-bolted door and a single window blocked by iron bars. How did the murderer escape?

You can try the game for free here: https://www.wildtangent.com/Games/victorian-mysteries-the-yellow-room

WildTangent Links:
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/WildTangentGames
